title: Soil response in a Mediterranean forest ecosystem of Southeast Spain following early prescribed burning
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Á. Fajardo-Cantos, E. Peña, P. Plaza-Álvarez, J. González-Romero, D. Moya, H. González-Camuñas, A. Díaz, R. Botella, M.E. Lucas-Borja, J. De Las Heras
